docs.snippet: A strategy of courting Republicans and focusing closely on Mr. Trump, they say, may impede Mrs. Clinton’s ability to claim a policy mandate if elected....
docs.lead_paragraph: A strategy of courting Republicans and focusing closely on Mr. Trump, they say, may impede Mrs. Clinton’s ability to claim a policy mandate if elected.
docs.abstract: ''Left-leaning Democrats are anxious about Hillary Clinton's eager courtship of Republicans disaffected with Donald J Trump;'' common worry is that election could turn into referendum on Trump and leave Clinton without progressive mandate.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton’s Edge in a Donald Trump-Centric Race Has Liberals Wary

docs.abstract: Paul Krugman Op-Ed column holds Hillary Clinton's economic vision contains very few outlandish assumptions, unlike those advanced by Donald Trump or any of his vanquished Republican primary opponents; praises Clinton for honesty with respect to her economic policy and questions whether she should have more ambitious agenda.
